statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({5.24}+{4.97}\right)}={20.42}\approx{20.42}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{4.97}\cdot{5.11}={25.3967}\approx{25.4}.
